dcterms:creator: K. Simonyan
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: UCF101 contains 13K videos spanning over 101 human action classes, making it a challenging dataset for action classification due to variations in pose, camera motion, viewpoint, and spatio-temporal extent of an action.
dcterms:title: UCF101

dcterms:creator: K. He
H. Fan
Y. Wu
S. Xie
R. Girshick
dcterms:description: HMDB51 contains around 6800 real-world video clips from 51 action classes, covering a wide range of actions including facial actions and general body movements. It is challenging due to poor video quality and significant camera motion.
dcterms:title: HMDB51

dcterms:creator: Gunnar Farneb√§ck
dcterms:description: Kinetics400 is a large video dataset containing 400 human action classes, with at least 400 real-world video clips for each action, making it a challenging dataset due to its diversity and variance.
dcterms:title: Kinetics400
